instructions: Tap the Albums tab, then tap the Places album. Select Map or Grid view. Only pictures and videos that have embedded location information (GPS data) are included. Tip: Zoom in and drag the map to see more specific locations.
Open a photo, then swipe up to see the photo details. Swipe up to view Places, then tap the location s name or address.
Tap a photo to view it in full screen. (The photo must contain location information.) Swipe up to view Places. Tap Show Nearby Photos.
In the Albums tab, tap the Places album. Tap Grid. Find a location with several images, then tap the header, marked with the arrow symbol . Tap the Play button .
